result.execSummary:
Robert William Buetow was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Robert William Buetow was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert William Buetow

defendant.name: Buetow, Robert William
defendant.address: 517 Wasson Ct. Apt. #40, River Falls, WI 54022

records.addlTxt:
1:06 PM CO: SJN, RPR: Deiss, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA: Erica Ellenwood with Student Intern Connor Smith  DF ATTY:  Stephanie Schmidt for today Defendant Robert William Buetow appeared by video, in custody. Atty Schmidt states DE would like to waive extradition. S/T Defendant. DE confirms address and DOB. Court find DE freely and voluntarily waives right to extradition. Court sets BBH in the event DE hasn't been picked up by Virginia.  gll
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Extradition Attachments- Virginia Beach VA. bph
